description:
Feature: Successful and Unsuccessful Course details for the Consumer application
		     As an user of the application
		     I want to test Course Detail feature
name: Successful and Unsuccessful Course details for the Consumer application

elements.description:
Description for 1) successfulSignIn - To verify successful SignIn for Consumer application with DATA SignIn_Success
Input Data: [[OILOILS100002, welcome], [wrong_msg]]
elements.name:
1) successfulSignIn - To verify successful SignIn for Consumer application with DATA SignIn_Success
Input Data: [[OILOILS100002, welcome], [wrong_msg]]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON home page
3. Then I am ON signIn pop_up
4. And  I ENTER valid credentials with DATA SignIn_Success
6. Then I am ON dashboard page

elements.description:
Description for 2) clickCourse - To Verify successful courses click on the added course in the Site Consumer Application with DATA CourseName_Success
Input Data: [[Mold Wizard], []]
elements.name:
2) clickCourse - To Verify successful courses click on the added course in the Site Consumer Application with DATA CourseName_Success
Input Data: [[Mold Wizard], []]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON dashboard page
2. When I VERIFY clickCourseName with DATA CourseName_Success
3. Then I am ON courseDetail page

elements.description:
Description for 1) To Verify the name of the course clicked for Site Consumer Application with DATA CourseName_Success
